Description of incident: The University's network was hacked on December 12, 2010.  The breach was discovered on December 13 and a statement was available on the University's website on January 31, 2011. Eight hundred students and 12,000 current and former employees and contractors were affected.  Only people who worked for Saint Louis University at some point had their Social Security numbers exposed.  Some students who received counseling through the University's Student Health Services may have had their names, dates of birth, tests, diagnosis and treatment information exposed.
